page.title: 01Ardleigh,Essex.General View
page.content: Block 06040228 shows most of{Ardleigh and parts of{Dedham}and{Lawford. The{A137}Colchester/Manningtree road crosses the{B1029}Frating/Dedham road at the village centre. { HOUSING}comprises 2 private estates, two former council estates, ribbon development, and isolated farms and farm cottages. { BRITISH RAIL's}main line from Colchester to Ipswich and Harwich crosses the area from SW to NE. { The mostly flat land is used for {arable agriculture, horticulture and {orchards.}The Foxash estate is a large area of small holdings with many glasshouses, producing mainly salad crops. { MARTELLS SANDPITS}have some derelict land due to abandoned workings. An Eastern section of{Ardleigh {Reservoir}is in the Western area.
